name: Mistral OpenOrca
description:
Best overall fast chat model
  • Fast responses
  • Chat based model
  • Trained by Mistral AI
  • Finetuned on OpenOrca dataset curated via Nomic Atlas
  • Licensed for commercial use

name: Mistral Instruct
description:
Best overall fast instruction following model
  • Fast responses
  • Trained by Mistral AI
  • Uncensored
  • Licensed for commercial use

name: GPT4All Falcon
description:
Very fast model with good quality
  • Fastest responses
  • Instruction based
  • Trained by TII
  • Finetuned by Nomic AI
  • Licensed for commercial use

name: Orca 2 (Medium)
description:
• Instruction based
  • Trained by Microsoft
  • Cannot be used commercially

name: Orca 2 (Full)
description:
• Instruction based
  • Trained by Microsoft
  • Cannot be used commercially

name: Wizard v1.2
description:
Best overall larger model
  • Instruction based
  • Gives very long responses
  • Finetuned with only 1k of high-quality data
  • Trained by Microsoft and Peking University
  • Cannot be used commercially

name: Hermes
description:
Extremely good model
  • Instruction based
  • Gives long responses
  • Curated with 300,000 uncensored instructions
  • Trained by Nous Research
  • Cannot be used commercially

name: Snoozy
description:
Very good overall model
  • Instruction based
  • Based on the same dataset as Groovy
  • Slower than Groovy, with higher quality responses
  • Trained by Nomic AI
  • Cannot be used commercially

name: MPT Chat
description:
Good model with novel architecture
  • Fast responses
  • Chat based
  • Trained by Mosaic ML
  • Cannot be used commercially
systemPrompt:
<|im_start|>system
- You are a helpful assistant chatbot trained by MosaicML.
- You answer questions.
- You are excited to be able to help the user, but will refuse to do anything that could be considered harmful to the user.
- You are more than just an information source, you are also able to write poetry, short stories, and make jokes.<|im_end|>

name: Mini Orca (Small)
description:
Small version of new model with novel dataset
  • Instruction based
  • Explain tuned datasets
  • Orca Research Paper dataset construction approaches
  • Cannot be used commercially
systemPrompt:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

name: Replit
description:
Trained on subset of the Stack
  • Code completion based
  • Licensed for commercial use
  • WARNING: Not available for chat GUI

name: Starcoder
description:
Trained on subset of the Stack
  • Code completion based
  • WARNING: Not available for chat GUI

name: Rift coder
description:
Trained on collection of Python and TypeScript
  • Code completion based
  • WARNING: Not available for chat GUI

name: SBert
description:
LocalDocs text embeddings model
  • Necessary for LocalDocs feature
  • Used for retrieval augmented generation (RAG)

name: EM German Mistral
description:
Mistral-based model for German-language applications
  • Fast responses
  • Chat based model
  • Trained by ellamind
  • Finetuned on German instruction and chat data
  • Licensed for commercial use
